0111001000010001 0001100011101110 1 -> sum: 1000101100000000, cout: 0
1010100101110010 0001001000010110 0 -> sum: 1011101110001000, cout: 0
0011101101111110 1011010101111000 0 -> sum: 1111000011110110, cout: 0
1110100100100101 1010111110011000 1 -> sum: 1001100010111110, cout: 1
1111000110011000 1110000111100111 0 -> sum: 1101001101111111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
